title: How many games do I have to leave before I get banned?
body:
Due to firewall bug, I play 4-5 games with out problems and my 5th game I get firewall taht does not let me connect to the game.

This is my 6th time I left a game in 1 week since the bug in the last patch.

I want to know how many leaves I got until I get perma banned. If that is the case I won't play on this account until the issue is resolved by Riot.

replies.body:
Tried for one last time, and it disconnected me again.

Moving to a different game, possibly DOTA. I will check if this game works once in a while.

With my new internet connection coming soon LOL might start working again. Until then play some other online game.

I think they would never fix this issue, even if they fix it, the upcoming 5.3 patch will break the game again like it happens every time. Then QQ the threads again.

Worst service ever for Oceania at least. 

Laters guys.

Hey godsmustbecrazy3,

Have you by chance completed the steps in http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WlGElu7g-update-firewall-error-after-champion-select.
We are aware that some players on Flip are experiencing this issue more than others, and we are currently gatehring data and working with Flip to try and resolve the matter. Of course not all players are with Flip so any data we can get to try and resolve the issue with be greatly appreciated.

If you haven't completed the steps in that thread, could you please head over there and do this so we can add your data to the analysis.

-ToxicHawk

Dear Toxichawk,
I submitted the data around 3 times already to Riot forum support team, and also through Submission tickets. Spoke to the Riot Technician. The Riot technician said it was ISP's fault. I tried all the steps mentioned on the support webpage. 

Spoke to my ISP too and all they could do was turn the interleaving off. 

Now moving to a different ISP, they are very expensive compared to my present ISP Flip. I am getting ripped off but what else can I do if Riot didn't fix the firewall error for 7 months. 

Bought a brand new modem too for 150 dollars but LOL still won't work. Every other online game works flawlessly, even Destiny works flawlessly for me. 

Good luck with finding the problem.

Thanking you.

Probably infinity. No tribunal gg wp.

You'll probably get temporarily banned at some point if you're regularly reported, though. I'd try and fix that firewall issue first.

Best of luck with it!

As you mentioned, I have to quit playing for a week or more I guess until they fix this issue.

Thanks man :)

That would probably cause a lot more problems than it would give solutions, my friend.

Retiring from the game for a bit is probably the most selfless thing you can do. Do make sure you check your connection a few times in custom games on a weekly basis, at least.
